// x1 = 32;
// x0 = 0;
// x8 = 8;

ld x10, 0(x1)           000000000000_00001_011_01010_0000011
LOOP
    beq x1, x0, END     00000010000000001000010001100011
    ld x4, 0(x0)        000000000000_00000_011_00100_0000011
    or x5, x4, x10      0110011_00100_01010_110_00101_0110011
    sd x5, 0(x0)        0000000_00000_00101_011_00000_0100011
    add x0, x0, x8      000000000100_00000_000_00000_0110011
    beq x10, x10, LOOP  11111100101001010000100011100011
END


00000000000000001011010100000011

00000110000000001000010001100011

00000000000000000011001000000011

00000000000000101011000000100011
